name: 老渔阳里2号（《新青年》编辑部）
name_en: Old Yuyangli No. 2 (New Youth Editorial Office)
address: 上海市黄浦区南昌路100弄2号
description: 《新青年》编辑部旧址，陈独秀与维经斯基曾在此会面，毛泽东也曾在此短暂居住。这里是马克思主义在中国传播的重要阵地。
description_en: The former editorial office of "New Youth." Chen Duxiu met with Grigori Voitinsky here, and Mao Zedong also briefly resided at this location. It was a significant center for the spread of Marxism in China.
